import { Component, ComponentFactoryResolver, HostListener,ComponentRef } from '@angular/core'; import { AddEmployeeComponent } from './add-employee/add-employee.component'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { ApiManagementService } from './Service/api-management.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'frontend'; submitted : boolean = false; formReset : boolean = false constructor(public service : ApiManagementService){} ngOnInit() { this.service.getAllEmployee() } receiveDataFromChild(data: boolean) { this.submitted = data; console.log(this.submitted) } deleteAllEmployee(){ this.service.deleteAllEmployee() this.service.getAllEmployee() } }
